content.rendered:
Staff Accountant | Tulsa,  OK  Duties and Responsibilities :
  • Prepare daily cash journal entries as provided by Treasury department.
  • Prepare and post monthly journal entries and weekly inventory adjustments.
  • Prepare monthly commission payment file for Accounting Manager review.
  • Manage the job cost process for all new equipment orders to ensure that we are recognizing costs and revenue appropriately.
  • Review rental revenue for each location and ensure that all third-party costs are accounted for monthly.
  • Perform financial statement analysis and balance sheet account reconciliation.
  • Maintain the accounting and reconciling for all fixed assets.
Desired Skills and Experience: Bachelor’s degree in accounting or college level work in accounting preferred.
  • Minimum 2 years of experience in general accounting.
  • Self-starter with thoughtful and analytical approach to planning, problem solving, and decision making.  Detail oriented and with “big picture” understanding.
  • High level of initiative and ability to work independently with limited supervision.
  • Demonstrated organizational and administrative ability.  Ability to balance time to meet multiple deadlines.
  • Customer Service orientation and good oral and written communication skills required.
  • Experience in fund accounting and/or cost accounting preferred.
  • PC proficiency and demonstrated ability to work with computerized accounting systems.
  • Demonstrated proficiency with spreadsheets, and other Microsoft products.
  • Ability to work under pressure of scheduled demands and meet all deadlines.
